name: Rainbow Snake - Alpha
description:
You know that classic game "Snake?" Here's a version of it where everything is made of rainbows! Created in June of 2022 as a fun little thing for Pride (and an exercise to see whether I could do it!)

Any proceeds will be donated to Out & Equal, an LGBTQ+ charity that advocates for LGBTQ+ people to express their authentic identities in their workplaces.
